email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 50,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV SEAHAWK, with a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m.

Our starting quote stands at USD 25.50 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 20 to October 25, ensuring a smooth turnaround.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the prompt response. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider revising the quote to USD 24.00 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the laycan period?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your feedback. After considering the current market conditions, we are able to offer a revised rate of USD 24.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata, and the laycan period remains as October 20-25.

Please let us know if this revised rate meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of USD 24.50 per MT. Could you please confirm the vessel's ETA at Richards Bay and provide the charter party for review?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. The vessel's ETA at Richards Bay is October 19, 2023. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let us know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Coal Shipment: MV SEAHAWK
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance in finalizing this shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
